EmailInformation.Subject: AE AIT Profile Update DAP Processor

SimpleDatabaseInput.QueryString: select Distinct line1 FROM (select cast ('Old_Loyalty_Num|New_Loyalty_Num|Customer_Nbr|Reject Reason' as varchar(100) ) as line1 from dual union all SELECT cast (pu.old_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.new_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.customer_nbr || '|Loyalty Number not in Database' as varchar2(100)) as line1 FROM BP_AE.X$_JRA_AEO2290_EXC pu LEFT JOIN Bp_Ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON to_number(nvl(Pu.customer_nbr,-1)) = Vc.linkkey WHERE (vc.linkkey IS NULL) union all SELECT cast (pu.old_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.new_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.customer_nbr || '|Loyalty Number not in Database' as varchar2(100)) as line1 FROM BP_AE.X$_JRA_AEO2290_EXC pu LEFT JOIN Bp_Ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pu.old_loyalty_number = Vc.Loyaltyidnumber WHERE (Vc.Loyaltyidnumber IS NULL) union all SELECT cast (pu.old_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.new_loyalty_number || '|' || pu.customer_nbr || '|Loyalty Number not in Database' as varchar2(100)) as line1 FROM BP_AE.X$_JRA_AEO2290_EXC pu LEFT JOIN Bp_Ae.lw_virtualcard vc ON pu.new_loyalty_number = Vc.Loyaltyidnumber WHERE (Vc.Loyaltyidnumber IS NULL))
